content:
HALF OF humanity is now online. What will the second half do when it logs on? The same as the first: friendly chat, personal expression and a lot of cat videos . Some studies show racial prejudice in America is actually going down, but America’s politics are still increasingly fractured along racial lines. And, why is it that screams are so prevalent in popular culture? Runtime: 21 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
网络 集合；聚集；聚合
eg2: They won 4–2 on aggregate.
他们以总分 4:2 获胜。
They won 4–2 on aggregate.
他们以总分 4:2 获胜。
aggregate demand/investment/turnover
总需求；总投资；总成交量
an aggregate win over their rivals
以总分战胜他们的对手
The scores were aggregated with the first round totals to decide the winner.
此次得分与第一轮所得总分合计决出优胜者。

ex: n. 断裂；裂缝；【医学】挫伤；【矿物】断口
v. (使)破裂；(使)折断；(使)断裂；使破坏
网络 骨折；破绽；破碎
eg2: a fracture of the leg/skull
腿骨╱颅骨骨折
a compound/simple fracture(= one in which the broken bone comes/does not come through the skin)
复合（开放）骨折；单纯（闭合）骨折
Old people's bones are more prone to fracture.
老人更易骨折。
His leg fractured in two places.
他的一条腿有两处骨折。
She fell and fractured her skull.
她跌倒摔裂了颅骨。
a fractured pipeline
破裂的管道
Many people predicted that the party would fracture and split.
很多人预言该党将分崩离析。
The company was fractured into several smaller groups.
这家公司被拆分成几家小公司。

ex: n. 人性；人类；人道；仁慈
网络 人文；博爱；人性化
eg2: crimes against humanity
危害人类罪
The story was used to emphasize the humanity of Jesus.
人们用这个故事来强调耶稣人性的一面。
united by a sense of common humanity
因一种同是人的情感而团结在一起
The judge was praised for his courage and humanity.
法官的勇气和人道受到称赞。

wp.without prejudice: 不损害权利;不受损害;无偏见;不受损害没有偏见
wp.racial prejudice: 种族偏见;种族歧视;偏见;侵害

eg2: What he said was tinctured with .
他说的话带有偏见。
That seems to me to be , as I said last time.
以上的想法在我看来,是一种偏见,正如我上次所说
The problem is that they have so much prejudice against our motherland.
问题是他们不应对我们的祖国抱有如此的偏见。

ex: adj. 流行的；普遍的，广传的
eg2: Where these 'lobster gangs' are , there are more lobsters.
在这些“龙虾帮”流行的地方，有更多的龙虾。
But since then, researchers worldwide have learnt much more about both the scale of the problem and the risk factors making these diseases increasingly .
但是从那以后，全世界的科学家对这个问题的程度以及让这些疾病越来越流行的风险因素有了更多的了解。
And I think there is too little written on how to integrate them together even though it is a very prevalent practice. Especially in the large HPC labs and universities.
尽管将两者集成在一起是非常普遍的实践（尤其是在一些大型的 HPC 实验室和大学里），但是我发现很少有文章对此进行介绍。

wp.profound impact: 深刻的影响;深刻影响;极大的冲击力或影响力;深远影响
wp.profound relationship: 深厚的关系;深刻的关系

ex: adj. 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的
eg2: The article implies  meaning.
那篇文章的含义很深。
He conceived a profound hatred for his enemies.
他对敌人有刻骨的仇恨。
And what is belief? It is a profound belief related to what you want to achieve.
那么什么是信念呢?它是一种和你想完成的事情有关的意义深远的信仰。

wp.racial hygiene: 种族优生;种族卫生;生政策
wp.Racial difference: 种族差异;种族差别;群差异
wp.Racial Issues: 美国种族问题;种族问题
wp.Racial tension: 种族关系紧张;种族紧张

eg2: He went on record as opposing racial discrimination.
他公开表示反对种族歧视。
The answer from some scientists who still do what could be called " science" appears to be yes on both counts.
来自仍然在做可以称之为“种族科学”的科学家们的答案，似乎这两个理由都对。
Because not only are we not comfortable talking about racial issues, but we also usually have one or two racist attitudes ourselves. (You don't have to admit it to me.
因为在谈及种族问题时，我们不仅是感到不舒服，而且通常我们自身也有一两种种族主义倾向。 （您不必向我承认它，不要担心。）

Title: “A profound improvement in humanity’s aggregate happiness”—the internet’s second half

paperStatistics.title: “A profound improvement in humanity’s aggregate happiness”—the internet’s second half
